achievements.name: Group Hug

achievements.name: Catch 'em All
achievements.description: Stored all Pet types in your Item Box or on your Heroes

achievements.name: Master Banker
achievements.description: Stored 15,000,000 Mana in your Mana Bank

achievements.name: Good Student
achievements.description: Completed the Tutorial. You deserve a cookie!

achievements.name: Legendary Defender
achievements.description: You have earned every Dungeon Defenders Accomplishment! Trendy salutes you!

achievements.name: Jingled All the Way
achievements.description: Delivered all the presents, and saved Santa Tavernkeep from the vile clutches of Mega-Snowman in the 'Etherian Holiday Extravaganza Challenge Mission'!

achievements.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Purple
achievements.description: You retrieved the Purple Lost Eternia Shard from the depths of Mistymire Forest!

achievements.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Purple
achievements.description: You retrieved the Purple Lost Eternia Shard from the depths of Mistymire Forest... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Portal Protector
achievements.description: You defended the portal against the rampaging Spider horde!

achievements.name: Nightmare Portal Protector
achievements.description: You defended the portal against the rampaging Spider horde... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Mythical Defender
achievements.description: You completed every mission in the original Campaign on Nightmare difficulty! Are you a god?

achievements.name: Hardcore Mythical Defender
achievements.description: You completed every mission in the original campaign on Nightmare difficulty without dying. You are a god.

achievements.name: Dungeon Raider
achievements.description: You completed every mission in the Assault Mission Pack!

achievements.name: Mythical Dungeon Raider
achievements.description: You completed every mission in the Assault Mission Pack on Nightmare Difficulty!

achievements.name: Playin' Cupid
achievements.description: You played matchmaker for the gender mobs on the Sky O' Love challenge, and defeated Mega Cupid!

achievements.name: Playin' Mythical Cupid
achievements.description: You played matchmaker for the gender mobs on the Sky O' Love challenge, and defeated Mega Cupid... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Transcendent Challenge Champion
achievements.description: You completed every original Challenge on Nightmare Hardcore difficulty. The gods weep before your awesome might!

achievements.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Blue
achievements.description: You retrieved the Blue Lost Eternia Shard from the scorching sands of Moraggo!

achievements.name: Djinn Recruiter
achievements.description: You assembled an army to win the 'War of the Djinn' Challenge!

achievements.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Blue
achievements.description: You retrieved the Blue Lost Eternia Shard from the scorching sands of Moraggo... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare Djinn Recruiter
achievements.description: You assembled an army to win the 'War of the Djinn' Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Transcendent Survivalist
achievements.description: You achieved Nightmare Survival Victory on every Campaign mission, and are thus rewarded!

achievements.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Yellow
achievements.description: You retrieved the Yellow Lost Eternia Shard from the cold waters of Aquanos!

achievements.name: Puzzle Solver
achievements.description: You solved the 'Riddle of the Deep' Challenge!

achievements.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Yellow
achievements.description: You retrieved the Yellow Lost Eternia Shard from the cold waters of Aquanos... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare Puzzle Solver
achievements.description: You solved the 'Riddle of the Deep' Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Real Time Strategist
achievements.description: Completed the Campaign and 3 Eternia Shards Missions using only summoned minions and Overlord mode for your entire team, except for the Final Wave.

achievements.name: Mythical Real Time Strategist
achievements.description: Completed the Campaign and 3 Eternia Shards Missions only using summoned minions and Overlord mode for your entire team, except for the Final Wave... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Red
achievements.description: You retrieved the Red Lost Eternia Shard from the billowing clouds of Sky City!

achievements.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Red
achievements.description: You retrieved the Red Lost Eternia Shard from the billowing clouds of Sky City... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Boss Crusher
achievements.description: You completed the Boss Rush Challenge!

achievements.name: Nightmare Boss Crusher
achievements.description: You completed the Boss Rush Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Heroes to the Rescue
achievements.description: You journeyed to the Crystalline Dimension, rescued the Legendary Heroes, and defeated an ultimate evil!

achievements.name: Nightmare Heroes to the Rescue
achievements.description: You journeyed to the Crystalline Dimension, rescued the Legendary Heroes, and defeated an ultimate evil... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: I've Got Monsters in My Pocket
achievements.description: You collected every Pet in all Etheria in your Item Box!

achievements.name: Ultimate Defender
achievements.description: You earned every Dungeon Defenders Accomplishment through the Eternia Shards Campaign! Trendy bows before your might!

achievements.name: Anniversary Defender
achievements.description: You defended your Tavern against the horde!

achievements.name: Nightmare Anniversary Defender
achievements.description: You defended your Tavern against the horde... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Pumpkin Party
achievements.description: You completed the Halloween Spooktacular 2 Challenge!

achievements.name: Pumpkin Party Nightmare
achievements.description: You completed the Halloween Spooktacular 2 Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Greater Turkey Hunter
achievements.description: You purged the ruins of Karathiki of all Turkey interlopers!

achievements.name: Nightmare Greater Turkey Hunter
achievements.description: You purged the ruins of Karathiki of all Turkey interlopers... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Not So Silent Night
achievements.description: You delivered Santa's goodies... and then took on the big man himself!

achievements.name: Nightmare Not So Silent Night
achievements.description: You delivered Santa's goodies... and then took on the big man himself... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Winter Wonderland
achievements.description: You survived the onslaught of the Holiday Guardians!

achievements.name: Nightmare Winter Wonderland
achievements.description: You survived the onslaught of the Holiday Guardians... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Playin' Anticupid
achievements.description: You successfully prevented hordes of mob matches in the Temple O' Love!

achievements.name: Nightmare Playin' Anticupid
achievements.description: You successfully prevented hordes of mob matches in the Temple O' Love... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Tinkerer's Defender
achievements.description: You Defended the Tinker's Lab and cleared the way for EV's upgrade!

achievements.name: Nightmare Tinkerer's Defender
achievements.description: You Defended the Tinkerer's Lab and cleared the way for EV's upgrade... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: EV Reprogrammer
achievements.description: You assaulted the Lab and eliminated the squad of corrupted EV's!

achievements.name: Nightmare EV Reprogrammer
achievements.description: You assaulted the Lab and eliminated the squad of corrupted EV's... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Trial by Fire and Lightning
achievements.description: You ventured into the heart of Embermount,  grounded the Harbingers and extinguished the flame of the mighty Phoenix.

achievements.name: Nightmare Trial by Fire and Lightning
achievements.description: You ventured into the heart of Embermount,  grounded the Harbingers and extinguished the flame of the mighty Phoenix... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Out Of This World
achievements.description: You saved the moonbase from the enemy onslaught!

achievements.name: Nightmare Out Of This World
achievements.description: You saved the moonbase from the enemy onslaught... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Hero of Water
achievements.description: You journeyed deep into the ocean and reclaimed the legendary Temple of Water from the horde of monsters!

achievements.name: Nightmare Hero of Water
achievements.description: You journeyed deep into the ocean and reclaimed the legendary Temple of Water from the horde of monsters... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Swashbuckler
achievements.description: You successfully defended Buccaneer Bay!

achievements.name: Nightmare Swashbuckler
achievements.description: You successfully defended Buccaneer Bay... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Crystalline Resurgence
achievements.description: You did battle once more in the mysterious lands where you once rescued the Legendary Huntress, Monk, and Apprentice!

achievements.name: Nightmare Crystalline Resurgence
achievements.description: You did battle once more in the mysterious lands where you once rescued the Legendary Huntress, Monk, and Apprentice... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare A Very Misty Christmas
achievements.description: You returned to Mistymire for a very special celebration... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare Exterminator
achievements.description: You ventured deep into the infested ruins and drove out the monstrous infestation of wasps... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare Slayer of Omenak
achievements.description: You defended the ancient Omenak Cathedral from the goblin hordes and their Flying Mech... on Nightmare!

achievements.name: Nightmare Tomb of Etheria
achievements.description: You dared to raid the Tomb of Etheria, and lived to tell the tale... on Nightmare!
